name: Scopefy
intro: Web3 social graph on Polygon blockchain
introduce: The Scopefy protocol is a Web3 social graph on the Polygon network, designed to empower content creators to own links between themselves and the community, forming a fully composable, user-owned social graph. This is achieved by allowing users to create profiles and interact with each other through those profiles. After a user creates a profile, they will receive a profile NFT with a sequential ID. This NFT controls the profile, so its owner becomes the actual controller of the given profile.
